name: Connectly.ai
description:
Connectly enables companies to send engaging WhatsApp Marketing campaigns to increase their return on investment.

Our no-code cloud platform lets businesses easily deliver interactive campaigns to their customers and community right in the threads of their favorite messaging channel. Use variables to personalize, add images and media to increase engagement, get actionable feedback on inbound messages, and analyze performance to improve campaigns over time - all without the support of an engineering team.

We also support delivering/receiving WA messages using our scalable and super easy to use API solution.

With Connectly, youâ€™re a click away from making WhatsApp your marketing and sales engine.
